title: Banking customers lose nearly $500M to scammers: Reports
description: The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) has released a damning report revealing that US banks failed to prevent scammers from making away with almost $500 million of their customers’ money in 2023. The report sheds light on the pervasive nature of fraud, with a staggering $10 billion stolen by scammers through various means over the year. […]
